title: My Parents Didn't Parent Me
description:
Melissa says she's angry over the lack of rules and poor guidance she got in her childhood and it's affecting her relationship with her mother. - Dr. Laura: "As an adult you are obligated to speak truthfully."

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
